Topic.Title: There Is A Race War Against Whites

Message.Msg: If the biggest thing you have to be proud of is the color of your skin, I feel sorry for you. A couple of hundred years ago a bunch of white guys sailed to Africa and committed atrocities against the residents. They abducted them by the thousands and shackled them in slave ships. They were brought to America their lives destroyed, their families torn apart, and set to work making their white masters rich while they were raped, beaten, and killed when their working lives were over. And you think blacks are inferior because their families aren't as strong, their education lacking, when all of their problems are the result of horrific mistreatment by whites? The very fact they're here is because of white greed and inhumanity. If you were truly honest with yourself about your race, you would spend your life in repentance and try to help those you have hurt.

Topic.Title: liberals

Message.Msg: What a sad person you must be. To even attempt to utlize the Murder of childern as a political statement is a new low for those of the radical right you repersent. While your pitiful statement contains major flaws and lies the the utlization of a tragic event like this to attempt to accomplish a political point is sick at the very best. The childern were from Liberal and conservative homes I am sure and real humans are moved to sorrow by the loss of all of them. Shame on you and anyone else that desires to make a political point of this tragic event. We should ALL be outraged and realize that we must determine what actions must be taken to prevent such thing from happening. One would hope that the disfunctional Congress could agree to put their political differences aside and actually attempt to solve a problem. The root cause of this tragic event does not have a simple answer, but we need solutions to this complex problem as a national priority not #$%$ political agendas. Political agendas have no place in any discussion of this event and to do so is just plain wrong.

Topic.Title: Never let a tragedy go to waste

Message.Msg: OK, so give us one, a fact that is, along with your source. Of the shootings in the U.S. in the last, say, 5 years or so, which resulted in death, what percentage involved somebody, other than a law enforcement agent, who was not in the process of committing a crime shooting someone who was in the process of committing a crime? Lets compare that number with the percentages of deaths by guns as a result of suicides, accidental shootings and unpremeditated shootings of family members and others in anger, typically by drunks. Message.Title: NOW MAYBE YOU'LL KNOW HOW WAR EFFECTED CHILDREN WE NEVER EVEN THOUGHT ABOUT
Message.Msg: I really feel guilty today. I grieved with the rest of the world about those beautiful little ones who were cut down in Connecticut. It was one of the most heart rendering things I ever encountered. I then for the first time (I'm ashamed to admit) I thought about the pictures and films of little Foreign children who I saw being incinerated by bombs and napalm during war. At that time I really never thought about how they were real children with mothers and fathers who I'm sure grieved just as we grieve about our children today. Life is nothing but a series of perceptions, and I hope from now on I hope I can perceive reality for everyone in an equal manner.
